thread.section_title: CarShop Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of www.carshop.co.uk
thread.title: Miss Chelsea Cowley
thread.title_full: CarShop reviewed by Miss Chelsea Cowley

author: Miss Chelsea Cowley
title: Miss Chelsea Cowley
text: Brilliant service. I came into carshop with a financed vehicle and expected it to be hastle and hard work. I was greeted outside by David who took me inside and explained to me how it works. He showed me which cars were in my budget, brought them round very promptly. Very polite and very helpful. The service from the colleagues and the company is very good i would deffinately recommend.
